name: Square avoider game? (GameAWeek)
description:
My first release for the "Game a week" challenge.

As suggested by that challenge name this game was made by me in a week. It is therefor not a fully featured game, more a prototype that I have polished as much as I could during the restricted time frame. It was programmed with Haxe and the flixel library.

High scores available at Newgrounds: http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/698301
